title: Siddy's Mediterranean chicken wraps
ingredients: ['8 chicken thighs', '3 carrots, roughly chopped', '1 onion, halved', '3 teaspoons salt', '6 medium potatoes', '6 peppers, seeded and cut into strips', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomotoes', '1 tablespoon tomoto puree', '1 tablespoon ketchup', '1/2 cucumber seeded and chopped into 1cm strips', '12 small tortilla wraps']
